field.label: Moneris Store Id
field.tooltip: Please enter the Store Id which you will find in your Moneris Developer Portal under My Profile > Full Profile > My Testing Credentials for sandbox environment.

field.label: Api Token
field.tooltip: Please enter the Api Token which you will find in your Moneris Developer Portal under My Profile > Full Profile > My Testing Credentials for sandbox environment.
field.comment: Please check Moneris' documentation for more information on how to get a Test Store ID and API Token.

field.label: Web Merchant Key
field.tooltip: Please enter the Google Pay Web Merchant Key which you will find in your Moneris Merchant Resource Center under Admin > Google Pay.
field.comment: Use the Web Merchant Key that corresponds to whichever stage of development you are in (testing vs. production).

field.label: Dynamic Descriptor
field.tooltip: Merchant defined description that will appear on the card statement. Dependent on the card issuer, the statement will typically show the dynamic desciptor appended to the merchant's existing business name separated by the "/" character.
field.comment:
Please note that the combined length of the merchant's business name, forward slash "/" character, and the dynamic descriptor may not exceed 22 characters.
Example:
Existing Business Name: ABC Painting
Dynamic Descriptor: Booking 12345
Cardholder Statement Displays: ABC Painting/Booking 1
